title: The Zero Product Property
text: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.

title: Factoring the Equation
text: We can factor $$49m^2-144$$ to use the zero product property. $$49m^2-144=\left(7m+12\right) \left(7m-12\right)$$

title: Using the Zero Product Property
text: As per the zero product property, if $$\left(7m+12\right) \left(7m-12\right)=0$$, then either $$7m+12$$ or $$7m-12$$ is equal to $$0$$. Setting both of these to $$0$$, $$m=\frac{-12}{7}$$ or $$m=\frac{12}{7}$$. Summing these values, we get $$0$$
